course_title: Applied Topics in QTM: Data Science Storytelling
class_notes: Combine the science of data analytics with the art of storytelling to effectively communicate your findings and results. In this course, we will explore how to combine meaningful narratives with the right data points to leave a lasting memory with an audience. We will review examples of data visualizations that changed the course of history (such as John SnowÂ¿s cholera map) and discuss emerging topics in AI that make data more accessible and the ability to communicate its importance more relevant than ever.
course_description: Topics course intended for early-career students. Topics allow students to explore the foundations, theory, and methods of data science, and examine the ways in which data driven solutions power industry, government, and the non-profit sector in an applied setting.
sections: Class Nbr: This section is full 2200, Section #: 2, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 4-6p, Instructor: Staff, Status: Closed
